/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the urban buildings that rise in the background. A large red truck, emblazoned with the words "Beijing Gas" in white, stands out prominently in the foreground. This truck, along with several other vehicles, adds a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The overall color palette of the image is dominated by shades of green, red, and blue, reflecting both the natural and man-made elements of the scene.
